Key:
Why the long face, Shido? You have been blessed
with the presence of the Yamai Sisters.

No, I know, but... I need to tell Arusu what love
is or we can't get out of this world, right?

Suggestion. We have just begun here. I think it's
too soon to stress about it.

Well, you have a point. But come to think of it,
isn't what you two have love? Would you guys be
able to give me any hints?

Correction. Yuzuru does love Kaguya, but I believe
it is different from the love between a man and
woman.

We are one in body and soul. Consider our
relationship to be a diamond that all others seek.
Only we can look upon the world from so high.

Analyzing. She seems to want to express that both
parties can support one another. Perhaps such a
relationship exists between a man and a woman.

That's right... But, it seems like there's
more to it...
Challenging question. Yuzuru does not know.

Anyways, Yuzuru. We should join Tohka and Origami
in that horrific pastime of theirs.

Agreed. You mean cards. Let's show them what we
are made of.

(At this rate, I don't think we'll be able
to sleep.)
